text: Balance is the debut album by Canadian rap group Swollen Members. It was released on the Battleaxe Records label. It has sold 41,000 copies since its release.http://jam.canoe.ca/Music/Lowdown/2005/08/15/1174276.html Guest stars include Del tha Funkee Homosapien, Saafir, Dilated Peoples, Everlast, and Son Doobie. Track 3, Lady Venom, appeared on the soundtrack of the 2001/2002 EA Sports video game NBA Live 2002. == Track listing == ==References== Counter Parts samples "Come Clean" by Jeru The Damaja Category:1999 debut albums Category:Swollen Members albums Category:Albums produced by Evidence (musician) Category:Albums produced by The Alchemist (musician) Category:Juno Award for Rap Recording of the Year recordings
title: Balance (Swollen Members album)
